actions.committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

official_title: Commending the first United States kindergarten, established in College Point, New York, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Commends the Poppenhusen Institute and the College Point community for establishing the first free kindergarten in the United States. Supports the strong beginning provided by kindergartens across the United States to the Nation's children.

titles.title: Commending the first United States kindergarten, established in College Point, New York, and for other purposes.
